noReply.reason: **Reason:** your message didn't ping `@helpme` and wasn't a reply to another user. See our server's [#faq](https://discord.com/channels/406534637242810369/687089022040146045) for details.

help.description: :pushpin: **Welcome to <#406554085794381833>:** a space to get help with Emacs or Emacs-relevant issues _within_ a Doom Emacs environment. _[Read this](https://discord.com/channels/406534637242810369/687089022040146045/844353544822718485) before posting._

help-nondoom.description: :pushpin: **This is <#806409569013858314>:** a support channel for Emacs or Emacs-relevant issues that occur in a __non-__Doom Emacs environment. _[Read this](https://discord.com/channels/406534637242810369/687089022040146045/844353544822718485) before posting._
